text: The Tiwana are a Punjabi Jatt clan from the Punjab region of India and Pakistan. The Tiwanas in Indian Punjab are mostly Sikhs, while the Tiwanas of Pakistani Punjab are almost all Muslims. The best-known member of this clan was late Malik Sir Khizar Hayat Tiwana who for some time remained Premier of the Punjab in British India, following Sir Sikandar Hayat Khan's demise. Category:Ethnic groups in India Category:Ethnic groups in Pakistan Category:Punjabi people
title: Tiwana
